lines.text: ...Do we know what Mass Arrest Momentum... looks like?
Like, maybe when it's active, it... makes... a bunch of illusory blood appear.
Did the book say anythin' about that?
Well, no, but... maybe it didn't think that was worth mentioning!
You don't think that'd be in the F.A.Q.?
''Hey, I froze my buddy, and they're bleedin' everywhere. What do I do?''
Maybe... the writers were pranksters! Kept that little bit a secret, for fun!
...Do wizards do that? Write spellbooks with pranks in 'em?
But- no, yeah, those books didn't seem like they had much of a sense of humor. I doubt it.
Then come up with an idea that you actually think makes sense.
